title: My chromas don't work
body: Sorry to waste time with this but, are chromas just disabled or something? They have just not been working for me since yesterday. Like, if I try to pick any character-skins that I have chromas for, i won't give me the option to use them. Is this something that I can fix, or do I just wait and hope that they work again soon?

replies.body: That's strange to hear,  I'm not aware of any issues with selecting chromas.  Are you using the updated client?  If so, what happens on the legacy?  Let me know and if this is still an issue!
